sentences.sentence: When it comes to dodging disaster, the champions of the insect world have to be cockroaches.
sentences.translation: 谈到躲避灾难，昆虫界的冠军非蟑螂莫属。

sentences.sentence: The majority allergens of urticaria papulosa were mites, cockroaches and mosquitoes.
sentences.translation: 丘疹性荨麻疹的大多过敏原主要为螨虫、蟑螂、蚊子。
